name: Paul_(Twin_Peaks)
text:
Paul (Twin Peaks)
For the newscaster, see Paul (Las Vegas).
Paul was a mutual acquaintance of Audrey Horne and her husband, Charlie.
During a heated argument, Audrey demanded that Charlie sign a set of papers she had given him. Charlie insisted he needed to run them by his lawyer, but Audrey retorted that she would run them by Paul and have Paul pay him a visit if he continued to refuse.
